channel.title: Programmed Cell Death on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in Programmed Cell Death on funPlantGenes

item.title: CitACS4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Cla011230 Gene Symbol: CitACS4 Gene Name: 1-aminocyclopropane-1-carboxylate synthase 4 Genome: watermelon genome() Species: Citrus sinensis Functional Descriptions: Mutation in the gene encoding 1-aminocyclopropane-1-carboxylate synthase 4 (CitACS4) led to andromonoecy in watermelon.

item.title: GmTOC1b
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GmTOC1b Gene Name: TIMING OF CAB EXPRESSION 1b Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a4_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: Homozygous GmTOC1b mutants exhibited increased tolerance to SMV strain SC3 due to the activation of programmed cell death triggered by a hypersensitive response.

item.title: NtCP1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: NtCP1 Gene Name: cysteine protease 1 Genome: Species: Nicotiana tabacum Functional Descriptions: NtCP1 encoding a C-terminus partial sequence of a putative tobacco cysteine proteinase gene whereas the 1300 bp fragment (NtCP2) is a full-length cysteine proteinase.

item.title: NtCP2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: NtCP2 Gene Name: cysteine protease 2 Genome: Species: Nicotiana tabacum Functional Descriptions: NtCP2 has a high similarity to KDEL-tailed cysteine proteinases and is expressed in mature green leaves.

item.title: PtomtAPX
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PtomtAPX Gene Name: mitochondrial ascorbate peroxidase Genome: Species: Populus tomentosa Functional Descriptions: PtomtAPX, a mitochondrial ascorbate peroxidase, plays an important role in maintaining the redox balance of Populus tomentosa Carr.
